b = np.array([1,20])

plt.plot(a)
plt.plot(b)
plt.xlabel('clubs')
plt.ylabel('players')
plt.title("Goals" )
plt.grid()

source.8b7d60c2:
y = np.array([3, 2, 5, 8])
mylabels = ["Dybala", "messi", "CR7", "Haaland"]
myexplode = [0.2, 0, 0, 0]
mycolors = ["red", "hotpink", "b", "g"]
plt.pie(y, labels = mylabels,startangle = 90, explode = myexplode, shadow = True, colors = mycolors)
plt.legend(title='Players')
plt.show()
